programme.title: His & Her Christmas
programme.desc: Tom Lane is the star columnist for the media conglomerate owned San Francisco Sun newspaper. The company is thinking about increasing Tom's exposure by producing a new television show around him. Liz Madison is the advice columnist for the little read community newspaper, the Marin County Voice, which is a throwback to gentler times. Besides their journalistic occupations, one other similar aspect between Tom and Liz is that they are both currently single, with their friends and family doing whatever they can to find that special someone for their personal life. On November 2, the staff at the Voice learn that the Sun ownership has bought their newspaper, with the probable goal of folding it into the operations of the Sun. If this move does happen, the staff at the Voice will lose their jobs. To fight back, Liz decides to change her column to an editorial espousing the meaning of Christmas and the newspaper to the community.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori gets breast revision surgery and throws a party to raise awareness for breast health. Time for a Booby Bash!

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori hosts a Bring it Back themed luncheon for her neighbors in Hidden Hills with the help of Teddi Mellencamp.

programme.title: Meet Me in New York
programme.desc: Events planner Kelly meets her match in web editor Joe when planning his niece's birthday party.

programme.title: Write Place, Write Time
programme.desc: When Paige writes under a pseudonym, will her boss and love interest Daniel find out?

programme.title: Courage
programme.desc: Jason Priestley stars in this inspirational adventure story about courage, love and the power of family.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: Best Friend From Heaven
programme.desc: When her dog is killed, Tara cancels her wedding. But her dog's ghost and her small town have a surprise.

programme.title: Crimes Of The Mind
programme.desc: A woman spends five years trying to get her brainwashed daughter back from a cult.

programme.title: Christmas in Scotland
programme.desc: On vacation in Scotland, an installation designer enters a festive contest with a local heir.

programme.title: Christmas Tail
programme.desc: A heartwarming tale of friendship and love as single mom Maggie adopts a Labrador for her son Ethan.

programme.title: Christmas Casanova
programme.desc: Elise and Daniyal start to fall for each other despite him trying to win over someone else.

programme.title: Ivy & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A young woman is determined to get home for Christmas, but gets stranded in a small town during a snow storm. Little does she know that she is exactly where she is supposed to be.

programme.title: A Cape Cod Christmas
programme.desc: A children's author hosts one last Christmas dinner before selling the family home but finds a way to save the home when reuniting with a former ex.

programme.title: You, Me, and that Mountain Retreat
programme.desc: Partnered with nature-hating Nathan, Rebecca is put to the test during a work mountain retreat.

programme.title: Becoming Ms. Bennett: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: American vlogger lands role in British 'Pride and Prejudice' film, faces challenge mastering the accent.

programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
programme.desc: When John's new dating app pairs him with radio host Maddie, sparks start to fly.

programme.title: What We Do For Love
programme.desc: Sophie secures a job at the famous wellness firm but soon clashes with the chief life coach Jason.

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone.

programme.title: Accidentally In Love
programme.desc: Edie discovers love in London days before leaving for the US. Fate reunites them six years later.

programme.title: Cowboy & Indiana
programme.desc: With new found hope, former world champion bull rider is given a dangerous shot to regain his former glory.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy Deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles.

programme.title: Don't Open Till Christmas
programme.desc: Somebody with very little Christmas spirit is killing anyone in a Santa suit one London holiday season, and Scotland Yard has to stop him before he makes his exploits an annual tradition.

programme.title: The Gay Deceivers
programme.desc: Danny and Elliot avoid military service by pretending to be gay, but they have to act the part when the recruiting officer doesn't buy it.

programme.title: The Italian Connection
programme.desc: The mob, bent on murderous revenge, pursues a man they mistakenly believe responsible for the theft of one of their drug shipments. Their elusive prey, however, has plans of his own, and they also include revenge.

programme.title: Ghost Keeper
programme.desc: Three friends on a New Year's Eve snowmobiling excursion find themselves stranded at an abandoned lodge where the elderly female innkeeper is concealing a sinister secret.

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. He and his transgender wife cut out the boy's tongue and raise him as a mute accomplice in their crimes. When the grown "Sonny Boy" escapes and tries to make contact with the outside world, the attention he draws to his warped family results in darkly-humored mayhem.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Henry falls in love with Lucy, whose short-term memory loss makes her forget him every time she falls asleep. As a result, Henry decides to win her over every day after she wakes up.

credits.actor: Adam Sandler,Drew Barrymore,Rob Schneider,Sean Astin,Lusia Strus,Blake Clark,Dan Aykroyd,Amy Hill,Allen Covert,Maya Rudolph,Kevin James

programme.title: 21 and Over
programme.desc: Jeff, a promising student, decides to celebrate his 21st birthday with his two best friends, on the night before his big medical school interview.

credits.actor: Miles Teller,Skylar Astin,Justin Chon,Sarah Wright,Francois Chau,Jonathan Keltz,Daniel Booko,Dustin Ybarra,Russell Hodgkinson,Russell Mercado,Josie Loren,Christiann Castellanos,Samantha Futerman,Julian Gavilanes,Josh Truax,Zach Sanchez

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

credits.actor: Bill Murray,Melissa McCarthy,Naomi Watts,Chris O'Dowd,Jaeden Lieberher,Terrence Howard,Kimberly Quinn,Donna Mitchell,Nate Corddry,Dario Barosso,Ann Dowd,Scott Adsit

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

credits.actor: Hugh Grant,Marisa Tomei,Bella Heathcote,Allison Janney,J.K. Simmons,Chris Elliott,Aja Naomi King,Annie Q,Andrew Keenan-Bolger,Karen Pittman,Maggie Geha,Steven Kaplan

programme.title: Land of the Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker shines a light on the lives of five wild brown bears inhabiting the Kamchatka Peninsula, exploring their daily adventures and activities.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After an embaressing defeat, a street dancer, Ash, assembles the best dancers from all across the world for another around against the Invincible crew.

credits.actor: Tom Conti,Falk Hentschel,Sofia Boutella,George Sampson,Stephanie Nguyen,Elisabetta Di Carlo,Samuel Revell,Akai Osei-Mansfield

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

credits.actor: Brant Daugherty,Maiara Walsh,Cody Christian,Lauren Bowles,Alexandria Deberry,Nick Gomez,Theodus Crane,Trenton Rostedt,Eric Buarque,Joseph Aviel

programme.title: Lay the Favorite
programme.desc: Ambitious about living the life of a cocktail waitress, a lap dancer tries her luck in Las Vegas. However, her life takes an unexpected turn after she falls in love with a sports gambler.

credits.actor: Bruce Willis,Rebecca Hall,Catherine Zeta-Jones,Vince Vaughn,Joshua Jackson,Laura Prepon,Frank Grillo,Wayne Pere,John Carroll Lynch,Corbin Bernsen

programme.title: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: New-York based lawyers Audrey and Daniel, who often compete against each other, get married. However, they find it difficult to learn to draw lines between their personal and professional lives.

credits.actor: Pierce Brosnan,Julianne Moore,Michael Sheen,Parker Posey,Frances Fisher,Nora Dunn,Sara Gilbert,Mike Doyle

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Forrest, a man with low IQ, recounts the early years of his life when he found himself in the middle of key historical events. All he wants now is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart, Jenny.

programme.desc: Elmo, Abby, and Tamir come across a wooden cricket. Something new they've never seen before! They try to figure out what it is and learn that it's Dave's favorite musical instrument from Cuba called a guiro.

programme.title: SESAME STREET S54

programme.title: SESAME STREET S54
programme.desc: Grover and his friend, the octopus, are helping at Hooper's Store but the octopus can only cook bread. With help from his friends, Grover fulfills his customer's orders while learning that families all over the world make bread in different kinds of ways.

programme.title: SESAME STREET S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Gabrielle, and Rosita join a basketball team! When Coach Jones start calling Rosita, Rosie, her friends encourage her to tell the coach that her name is Rosita. Rosita is proud of her name and names are a big part of who we are.

programme.title: SESAME STREET S54
programme.desc: Gabrielle, Charlie, and Abby are having a sleepover! As they start their bedtime routines, they learn that they have routines both different and alike.

programme.title: SESAME STREET S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Tamir, Charlie, Julia, and Cookie Monster are making self-portraits in the community garden with Kayla. Kayla guides them to look into the mirror and notice the beautiful things that make you, you! Everyone looks at themselves in the mirror and starts drawing what they see. They also learn their identity is about what you love to do. So, they add onto their self-portraits and then share their drawings with each other.
